mapper.select: SELECT s.*, c.cno c_cno, c.name c_name, p.pno p_pno, p.name p_name, p.type p_type, p.edu_sys p_edu_sys, p.degree p_degree, p.code p_code, g.gno g_gno, g.name g_name, g.layer g_layer, g.grade g_grade FROM `students` as s JOIN `colleges` as c on c.cno = s.college_id JOIN `grades` as g on g.gno = s.grade_id JOIN `professions` as p on p.pno = s.profession_id WHERE s.sno = #{sno}

SELECT sc.term, sc.stu_id, c.name c_name, c.property c_property, c.credit c_credit, t.name t_name FROM `stu_course` AS sc JOIN `courses` AS c ON sc.course_id = c.cno JOIN `teachers` AS t ON sc.teacher_id = t.tno WHERE sc.stu_id = #{sno}

SELECT sc.term, sc.stu_id, c.name c_name, c.property c_property, c.credit c_credit, t.name t_name FROM `stu_course` AS sc JOIN `courses` AS c ON sc.course_id = c.cno JOIN `teachers` AS t ON sc.teacher_id = t.tno WHERE sc.stu_id = #{sno} AND sc.term = #{term}

SELECT scs.term, scs.score, scs.stu_id, c.name c_name, c.cno c_cno, c.property c_property, c.credit c_credit, t.name t_name FROM `stu_course_score` AS scs JOIN `courses` AS c ON scs.course_id = c.cno JOIN `teachers` AS t ON scs.teacher_id = t.tno where scs.stu_id = #{sno}

SELECT scs.term, scs.score, scs.stu_id, c.name c_name, c.cno c_cno, c.property c_property, c.credit c_credit, t.name t_name FROM `stu_course_score` AS scs JOIN `courses` AS c ON scs.course_id = c.cno JOIN `teachers` AS t ON scs.teacher_id = t.tno WHERE scs.stu_id = #{sno} AND scs.term = #{term}
SELECT * FROM stu_acti AS sa JOIN activities as ac ON sa.act_id = ac.eno WHERE sa.stu_id = #{sno}
